snippet: A criminal complaint says Cheng Le suggested to an undercover F.B.I. employee that he had a client who wanted to use the highly toxic poison to kill someone who was hospitalized.
abstract: Manhattan man Cheng Le is arrested and charged with attempting to buy ricin poison after making deal with undercover FBI agent over Internet.
lead_paragraph: A criminal complaint says Cheng Le suggested to an undercover F.B.I. employee that he had a client who wanted to use the highly toxic poison to kill someone who was hospitalized.

headline.main: U.S. Charges Manhattan Man With Trying to Buy Ricin
headline.print_headline: U.S. Charges Man With Trying to Buy Ricin
